description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/17/105055) granted on 3rd April 2018 for the demolition of one (1) existing single storey garage block comprised of eleven (11) garages and a screen wall at Crossway Court, Endwell Road SE4 2NE and the construction of a part three/part four storey building to provide nine (9) residential units comprised of 5 x 3 bed, 2 x 2 bed and 2 x 1 bed self contained units, together with landscaping, refuse, sixteen (16) secure cycle parks and nine (9) car parks in order to change the wording of Condition 10.
site_name: GARAGES AT CROSSWAY COURT, ENDWELL ROAD, LONDON, SE4
